message: A glowing wireframe floor extends as far as the eye can see.
It's like I'm in some kind of game...
A blue glow appears in front of me, growing into a human shape.
I almost topple over when I see who it is.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell? What's going on? And why do you look like that?"

name: 蓮
message: "It seems that Allmates appear in Online Mode here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Isn't Online Mode for Rhyme? I've only seen your Online form in your settings panel."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That voice just now said something about Rhyme..."

name: 蓮
message: "That appears to be the case. However, our physical location has not changed."
Ren pushes me away and I tumble to the floor. A powerful blast of air passes just above my head.

name: 蓮
message: "This is a public Rhyme field. We've been pulled into a Rhyme match against our will."
My eyes go wide when I see what it is.
...No. A person wearing a rabbit's head.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Here what comes?! What am I supposed to―"

name: ウサギモドキリーダー
蒼葉
message: "That was close! Hey, wait a minute!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't play Rhyme! Cut it out!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "How do you know my name? And who's this Sly-whatever?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said I've never done this before!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, isn't there something you can do?! Like some command to get us out of here?"

name: 蓮
message: "I tried, but the logout function has been disabled."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell is going on here?!"

name: 蓮
message: "Rhyme is normally safe. There are limits in place to prevent damage to the body."

name: 蓮
message: "But somehow, those limits have been removed."

name: 蓮
message: "Damage taken here may cause physical harm."

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "You can run, but you can't hide."
I look up to see the rabbit peering at me from a nearby block.

name: ウサギモドキリーダー
